Only *3* years ago today I started really learning #RStats with a certain online site. I learned so much. I wish they didn't turn out to be awful, so I could recommend them to other people in good conscience.

Today I wrote fractal pkg for Julia Sets (frak) + pkg of simple non-linear interp easing funcs (displease)

Result: calc & display of 800x800 fractal from #RStats at ~40 frames per second!

This is a realtime capture of my screen - not a render to gif/mp4

Using {sdlr}. https://t.co/LPYprBrz3n
